pullRequest.title: Fix link to SameSite cookies on security guide
pullRequest.bodyText: Asciidoc links to relative location needs explicit text decoration for correct generation.

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            Please see link:vertx#same-site-cookie[that] for information about adding a https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Headers/Set-Cookie/SameSite[SameSite] cookie property to any of the cookies set by a Quarkus endpoint.
          
          
            
            Please see link:vertx#same-site-cookie[SameSite cookies] for information about adding a https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Headers/Set-Cookie/SameSite[SameSite] cookie property to any of the cookies set by a Quarkus endpoint.
          
      
    
    
  

Good catch btw!

+Please see link:vertx#same-site-cookie[that] for information about adding a https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Headers/Set-Cookie/SameSite[SameSite] cookie property to any of the cookies set by a Quarkus endpoint.

commit.message: Fix link to SameSite cookies on security guide

beforeCommit.message:
Update docs/src/main/asciidoc/security.adoc

Using a descriptive text for linking to `SameSite` cookies
configuration on Vert.x.

Co-authored-by: Guillaume Smet <guillaume.smet@gmail.com>

afterCommit.message: Fix link to SameSite cookies on security guide
